_sText:
Deathrun Solar.
17 traps.
4 Special nades.
4 endings.
5 minute timer to complete the map before everything blows to shit.
40 Ct spawns, 3 T's.

Traps -
1. Noob filter in the start
2. Barrel target practise
3. Slippy stairs
4. Rifle zone.
5. Unsafe floor.
6. Very unsafe floor.
7. Spikes.
8. Big jump.
9. Meteor rain.
10. Angry ice stars.
11. Spinning thing.
12. Icy ice
13. Angry baby
14. Lightning
15-17. Randomly chosen sacrifise platforms.

Endings - 
1. Survival.
2. Bhop.
3. Speed Knife.
4. Rope jump.

Nades - 
1. Music Nade.
2. Camera Nade.
3. Sprite/Fire Nade.
4. Sprite/Fire Nade.

"Armageddon" timer
You got 5 minutes to complete the map before everyone dies in a hellish inferno. (This is still under developpment, currently there will just be a shake and a insta gib on everyone on the map, except if you are on the endings.)

As you may have figured out, it's not the longest or hardest map, but it's still in beta and seeing how things go and what feedback I get back, i'll find out wether I'll expand it or what I'll do.
Also, I won't explain what the traps do, removes half the fun - if you desperately need to know, it's just to download and play it as T =]

|oG| Sεrz
